metadata.title: CVE-2024-30896 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: InfluxDB through 2.7.10 allows allAccess administrators to retrieve all rawtokens via an "influx auth ls" command. NOTE: the supplier indicates thatthis is intentional but is a "poor design choice" that will be changed in afuture release.

criterions.comment: influxdb package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
